DOC.brief_summary: Children ages 3-7 who are undergoing blood drawing receive either standard care, topical medicine for numbing (LMX4), or the study intervention which utilizes ultrasound to speed the onset of LMX4 from 30 minutes to 5 minutes. The child's pain with the blood drawing procedure is evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Reduction of Topical Anesthetic Onset Time Using Ultrasound
